attributes.action: Do not ban the Xl bully
attributes.additional_details: these wannabe gangsters who think is acceptable to train these loyal, loving dogs to attack. These dogs are not bred for that they are bred to be a family dog.
attributes.background: Banning the Xl bully will not solve the problem, you need to start with the bad owners and backyard breeders, who are breeding these monstrosities that are not true XL bullies you need to have a look at

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
